name: ReSpawn (Nore5515)
description:
Made for a game jam. More details after!

It was made for the Game Boy jam 8, which required a very limited screen. I recommend going fullscreen!

Use the arrow keys to do things, and Z+X for jump and suicide respectively.

Z to start!

R to go back to the level select.

Leave a comment with any bugs you find/suggestions you have!
